enhanced_by.reason: The put method transforms the key using transformKey before inserting it into the map.
The put method transforms the value using transformValue before inserting it into the map.
The putAll method uses transformMap to transform all entries before inserting them into the map, which is similar to the put method's transformation process.
The put method relies on the decorated map's put method to actually insert the transformed key-value pair.
The put method may be used in conjunction with a LinkedMap instance, which can be initialized with a map that needs to be transformed.
